title: Lefroy Exploration Issues New Performance Rights
text:
Confident Investing Starts Here:

with TipRanks' new KPI Datafor smart investment decisions - Receive undervalued, market resilient stocks right to your inbox
with TipRanks' Smart Value Newsletter
Lefroy Exploration Ltd. ( (AU:LEX) ) has issued an update.
Lefroy Exploration Ltd. has announced the issuance of 3,404,069 performance rights set to expire on December 31, 2026. These unquoted equity securities are part of an employee incentive scheme and will not be listed on the ASX, potentially impacting the company’s employee retention and motivation strategies.
More about Lefroy Exploration Ltd.
Average Trading Volume: 338,336
Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell
Current Market Cap: A$26.08M
